snippet: The wagon, the second Cruze body style not to be offered by Chevrolet in the United States, will have its official debut at the Geneva auto show in March.
abstract: The wagon, the second Cruze body style not to be offered by Chevrolet in the United States, will have its official debut at the Geneva auto show in March.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, General Motors announced it would introduce a station wagon version of Chevrolet Cruze at the Geneva auto show next month. To the potential ire of some American drivers, it will not be offered for sale in the United States.

headline.main: Chevrolet Cruze Wagon Is Bound for Geneva, but Not America

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
